snippet.title: GladiEATers Gameplay Trailer - Convergence Showcase
snippet.description:
Enjoy this exclusive trailer for MilkBubblesGames and Kwalee's 'eat em up, which debuted at the Convergence Games Showcase. Play as the world's best Combat Chefs and cook up powerful food monsters to command in turn-based battles. Combine recipes, discover unique food fighters and battle through the CALosseum to become the ultimate champion.

Wishlist today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2141280

#convergenceshow #indiegame
